metadata.name: HackTool - XORDump Execution
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious use of XORDump process memory dumping utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\xordump.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -process lsass.exe ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m comsvcs ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m dbghelp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m dbgcore '))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious use of XORDump process memory dumping utility

metadata.objective: False positive: Another tool that uses the command line switches of XORdump Reference: https://github.com/audibleblink/xordump
